summary: Dragonbone Greatsword from Dawnguard scaled down to be used as a one handed sword. Craftable at a forge, upgradable at a grindstone. Non replacer; replacer version added. Shortsword version added! Plus bonus Greatsword sheath!
descriptionHtml:
Update 12/02/2013
Added a sheath to Dragonbone Daggers. Replacer.

Update 14/09/2012
Dragonbone Greatsword sheath added. Adds a sheath to ALL Greatswords. Replacer.

Update 16/08/2012
Shortsword speed and damage adjusted.

Update 10/08/2012
Shortsword version added! Craft at a forge, upgrade at a grindstone.

Update 06/08/2012
Replacer version added. Extract to your Skyrim\\Data folder (see below) and you\'re good to go!

DESCRIPTION

As soon as I saw the Dragonbone Greatsword, I thought: \\\"when Dawnguard gets released for the PC, I\\\'m gonna try and mod this to be a one handed sword.\\\" I don\\\'t think it\\\'s perfect, but it\\\'s as close as I can get to something that satisfies me; I wasn\\\'t planning on releasing this but I thought maybe others felt the same. So here you go. This mod DOESN\\\'T replace all one handed Dragonbone swords with the two handed version.

The model is scaled down about 20% to look a little more like a one handed blade. It can only be obtained through crafting at a forge (1 dragon bone, 1 ebony ingot, 1 leather strip); this is to prevent conflicts as my game isn\\\'t in english.
Also, it is possible to upgrade it at a grindstone, using a dragon bone.
Stats wise, the sword is a little better than a regular one handed Dragonbone sword, but not as good as the two handed version.

INSTALLATION

To install, simply extract the archive to your Skyrim\\\\Data folder, usually located in C:\\\\Program Files [(x86)]\\\\Steam\\\\SteamApps\\\\common\\\\Skyrim\\\\Data
Answer yes to all if prompted; it won\\\'t overwrite anything.

REQUIREMENTS

Skyrim (latest version);
Dawnguard DLC

ISSUES

None that I am aware of. Please report any in the comments section; I don\\\'t plan on updating this mod as I think it is pretty much final, but I will try and fix any issue that may arise.

PERMISSIONS

Feel free to do whatever you want with this mod.
author: Frstwlf
